com.direwolfdigital.cake.data.achievemen: Knock Out 30 Pokémon with your non-Basic Pokémon.
com.direwolfdigital.cake.data.decks.pcds: Rule the battle with the Legendary Pokémon of order and control: Zygarde! With Lucario's fists of justice and Serperior's crushing coils, you'll bring order to chaos and seize the moment with the Battle Ruler theme deck. On to victory!

Unleash a storm of battle with the Legendary Pokémon of the seas: Lugia! With the fiery wings of Moltres and the mystic flame of Delphox, you'll burn through opposition in a flash with the Sky Guardian theme deck. Light it up!
